name: Middle-earth™: Shadow of War™ Starter Bundle
detailed_description:
Your ability to purchase gold will cease on May 8. The Market will permanently close on July 17. Visit our Shadow of War Community site for more information.

The Middle-earth™: Shadow of War™ Starter Bundle includes:
• Silver War Chest containing Orcs to forge your army, with at least one Epic Orc
• Gold Loot Chest containing Epic Gear items & XP Boost
• 100 Gold

pc_requirements.minimum:

  • OS: Windows 7 SP1 with Platform Update
  • Processor: AMD FX-4350, 4.2 GHz / Intel Core i5-2300, 2.80 GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD HD 7870, 2 GB / NVIDIA GTX 660, 2 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 70 GB available space
